sectionTitle: How we take care of our patients

p.li: By considering the wellbeing of the whole body, each component can be seen on a biochemical, cellular, and systematic level. Furthermore, it becomes clear that all components are interconnected. It also means that when assessing health problems, we consider all other possible influencing factors to the patient, including their physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual well-being.

ul.li: So for example, if a patient comes to us with symptoms of IBS, we will not simply focus on the disease, or treat just the digestive system. Instead, we will take into account all other historical and current health issues, such as:
We do not advocate one type of diet, like low GI, gluten-free foods, paleo, GAPS, vegan, raw, or macrobiotic diets. Similarly, we do not promote any food or supplement related to fads or fashion.
